org.plasmarobotics.jim.sensors

Class SonicRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.plasmarobotics.jim.sensors.SonicRange

  • public class SonicRange
extends Object
    This class reads input from a supersonic rangefinder as an analog input
    Author:
    jim

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SonicRange(int channel)
      Creates an instance of SonicRange at the specified channel with default rangeConstant of .0098
      SonicRange(int channel, double rangeConstant)
      Creates an instance of SonicRange at the specified channel along with constant for range

        Just like Zero...
        Parameters:
        target - Target distance to achieve
        tolerance - difference from perfect(You will never be AT an EXACT spot)
        Returns:
        true if you are close to target range
